0.1.1.name: wordpress/yd-wordpresscom-stats-integration
0.1.1.description:
Import your Wordpress.com statistics in your posts meta fields automatically

This plugin needs the Worpdress.com stats plugin.

Your Wordpress.com statistics account must be activated.

It will automatically import all your view per post stats inside your Wordpress database, using your post's meta information fields.

Active support

Drop me a line on my YD Wordpress.com Stats Integration plugin support site to report bugs, ask for specific feature or improvement, or just tell me how you're using the plugin. It's still in an active development stage, with new features coming out on a regular basis.
